item.title: Jen add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it." -- Aristotle

item.title: Jen add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Jen add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Jen add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jen add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart" -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Jen add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks
